channel.title: Chat Box Color
channel.description: In earlier servers, you could edit the chat box color of text by using something like "@blu@" or "@red@." I'm using a 562 server, though, and those no longer work. How can I change the color of text ONLY in the chat box? I'm not sure if this is client or server based, but it's probably a combination of both.

item.title: Chat Box Color
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

In earlier servers, you could edit the chat box color of text by using something like “@blu@” or “@red@.” I’m using a 562 server, though, and those no longer work. How can I change the color of text ONLY in the chat box? I’m not sure if this is client or server based, but it’s probably a combination of both.

Read full topic
